metadata.name: Beyond the Universe
metadata.description:
Beyond the Universe is an artwork that represents an imaginary journey through the cosmos, landing on my planet.

At the center of the work are three animated dresses from the Persistence collection. Representing art on the left, science on the right and their guardian in the centre.

Behind it is the monogram that represents light as a beacon and even more behind the corresponding planets of the muses.

The lines and shapes that make up this animation are fluid and harmonious, creating a dynamic and vibrant visual effect.

The work was created with great attention to detail and compositional balance, creating an atmosphere of mystery and wonder.

In short, "Beyond the Universe" is a work that invites the viewer to immerse themselves in a fantastic journey through the universe, creating an immersive and fascinating visual experience.
